mapper.select: SELECT a.title,cate_name, a.update_time,a.publish_time,SUM(d.views) 'views',SUM(d.likes) 'likes',SUM(d.comments) 'comments' from days_data d LEFT JOIN article a on d.article_id=a.article_id LEFT JOIN category c on a.cate_id=c.cate_id where days >=#{start} and days <=#{end} GROUP BY d.article_id
